Entries.25{{YearRemainder}}: Ugh, we seem to have a digital dermatitis outbreak among my cows.#$b#I'll need to get a vet in, might need to get antibiotics administered.
Entries.26{{YearRemainder}}: Between you and I, I wish it was easier to socialize around these parts without going to the Saloon.#$b#It's not good for Shane.

Entries.5_2: My dear Bessie stepped on a nail the other day. Poor darling, I need to do a better job making sure their pen doesn't have dangerous items in it.
Entries.7_2: I try to keep my dairy organic. It's better for the cows, most of the time.
